name: Dragon's Requiem
description:
The story follows Diathar the Dragon Knight and Gailbyg the Fierce. Daemon hunters from Dernia during an unspecified age. Stranded on a volcanic island, you both struggle to survive the Dragon’s Requiem.

Thirty unique monsters. Five total dungeons, including a secret dungeon and a hidden character. Stable version does not require any NFTs to play.
